QuestData.Title: Planting the Heart
QuestData.Description: I have removed that foul moss from the heart, but it remains tainted...$B$BTry placing the heart in my planter. It is filled with a nutritive soil that may cleanse and heal the heart.
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant the Tainted Heart in Denalan's Planter.
QuestData.CompletionText: This planter is filled with soil, specially prepared by Denalan.
QuestData.RewardText: You place the heart within the planter, and it quickly digs itself in!$B$BA few seconds later it wriggles back out, cleansed. It pulses slightly... beckoning for you to take it.
